narrativeData.story: In the realm of Eclipse Eternal, two suns shimmer in the sky, casting an everlasting twilight over the land. The land is rich with mystical flora and fauna, glowing with otherworldly beauty. However, a mysterious darkness looms on the horizon, threatening to consume the balance between light and shadow. As the shadows grow longer and the dual suns wane, heroes must rise to face the encroaching darkness and restore harmony to Eclipse Eternal.
narrativeData.greetingGameMessage: Welcome, brave adventurer, to the boundless realm of Eclipse Eternal. May your courage shine bright in the eternal twilight of our world.
